radiographic_examinations.findings: There has been some interval improvement in the aeration in the left lower lobe, but there is still a wedge-like area of volume loss/infiltrate in the left lower lung and similar area in the right lower lung. The NG tube tip is in the proximal portion of the duodenum. Residual contrast is seen in the colon.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Some interval improvement in the aeration in the left lower lobe.
